Class InstantRunoff

java.lang.Object
InstantRunoff
public class InstantRunoff extends Object
Class that represents an Instant Runoff election.
Since:
1.0

    InstantRunoff(AuditFile electionFile)

      Constructor creates a InstantRunoff object and initializes its ballots and candidates.

  • Method Details

    • runElection

      public Candidate runElection()
      This method runs the Instant Runoff Algorithm.
      Returns:
      the candidate object that has been determined as winner.

    • dropCandidate

      public Candidate dropCandidate(Candidate candidate, int round)
      Method that drops a candidate with the lowest amount of votes.
      Parameters:
      candidate - the candidate object who is being dropped.
      Returns:
      returns the candidate that has been dropped.

    • distributeBallot

      public void distributeBallot(Ballot ballot, int round)
      Method that redistributes ballot according to their choice and by round.
      Parameters:
      ballot - is the ballot which will be redistributed.
      round - the current round of vote distribution.

    • coinFlip

      public Candidate coinFlip(ArrayList<Candidate> candidates)
      Generates a random number to fairly pick a candidate at random.
      Parameters:
      candidates - the list of candidates to pick from.
      Returns:
      the candidate that is picked by the random number.

    • getDroppedCandidates

      public ArrayList<Candidate> getDroppedCandidates()
      Allows user of InstantRunoff to get the list of dropped candidates.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of dropped candidates.
